Class ec.util.OptionEnumeration 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.util.OptionEnumeration
public class OptionEnumeration
extends Object
implements Enumeration
This class provides a convenient way to parse command-line options. An OptionEnumeration yield as elements one of: a simple String argument or an Option with a key and optional value, as defined in the input option table.

OptionEnumeration(String[], OptionTable)
Construct an OptionEnumeration based on the given args and the given OptionTable.

hasMoreElements()
Implementation of method of java.util.Enumeration.
nextElement()
Implementation of method of java.util.Enumeration.
nextString()
Get the next element but just assume it to be a raw String.

OptionEnumeration 
 public OptionEnumeration(String theArgs[],
                          OptionTable theTable)
Construct an OptionEnumeration based on the given args and the given OptionTable.

Parameters:
theArgs - the args to parse
theTable - the OptionTable to consult
